Container.Name: ai-stack-frontend
Container.Overview: Custom dark-mode WebUI for AI Stack - modern React + TypeScript chat interface replacing AnythingLLM. Features multi-agent support (Food/Task/Event), toast notifications, mobile-responsive design, and seamless LangGraph backend integration. 100% local, privacy-first, ChatGPT-inspired dark theme.
Container.Requires: Create Docker network first: docker network create ai-stack-network. LangGraph agents container must be running. Build from /mnt/user/appdata/ai_stack/frontend directory.
